nodes.text: Junk Titans were bits and pieces of trash held together by Kazdan Paratus' Force powers. They were part of Paratus' private army of junk golems. Starkiller faced at least four of these on Raxus Prime before confronting Paratus himself.

The massive Junk Titan was animated by the Force and was far larger than the Junk behemoths. Its distinctive head was from a Vulture droid and it made use of a large club-like weapon, which it plunged into the ground to summon Scrap Guardians to its aid or to smash its enemies, such as Starkiller. When enraged, it was capable of using its arms to rip junk from the ground and throw it at its enemies.
A Titan was present within the Raxus Prime Jedi Temple where it battled against Marek but was destroyed by the Sith apprentice.
In an interview during the 3rd The Force Unleashed segment on Spike TV on the official TFU website, W. Haden Blackman calls the Junk Titan "a construct literally held together by the Force".

In the Wii, PSP, and PS2 versions of The Force Unleashed, the Junk Titan had a different look and is only shown once, as a boss before fighting Kazden. In this version, it had a much more different appearance and abilities, and the body was covered in what looks fabric to represent a robe. For weaponry, the junk titan used a large axe in combat.
